main.name: Shubham Nagpal
main.description: Full Stack Developer by Day, Freelancer by Night
main.bio: My name is Shubham, I am a recent graduate with a B Tech degree specialized in Information Technology from Dr. Akhilesh Das Gupta Institute of Technology and Management. A quick learner with proven abilities to work on different technologies quite efficiently. Motivated towards learning new skills and applying them to solve real-world problems. Looking forward to working in a challenging environment with a high growth trajectory.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Dr. Akhilesh Das Gupta Institute of Technology and Management
Govt. Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya, Ramesh Nagar
Guru Angad Public School, Ashok Vihar

work.title: Jr. Executive Information System
work.description: I am a part of the User Device Security/SCCM team. As a team, our main aim is to make sure that all the devices in the organization are secure and UpToDate. To ensure security we use TrendMicro antivirus. Besides that, I am also a part of the SCCM team which is mainly responsible for the application deployment.

work.title: .Net Developer Intern
work.description: I worked on several mini-projects that comes under insighter like image stitching, object detection, 360-degree media player, etc. I used C#, .net to implement these projects.

work.title: IT Intern
work.description: Collaborate within an Agile team structure where they will assist with developing code using such technologies as: Java and JavaScript. Maintained the current website and added more appealing features.

work.title: Project Trainee
work.description: I was in a part of the team that takes care of all devices in a network within a center. To make sure that no device goes offline while examination.

projects.title: VidCaller
projects.category: Video calling application made with NodeJS (ExpressJS, NodeJS, PeerJS)

projects.title: Personal Blog
projects.category: Personal Blog Web App built with (MongoDB, ExpressJS, EJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Todo List

projects.title: Simon

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
